name: Mecha (Aboud2012)
description:
A 2D Pixel art Platformer Action Game

Controls:

Single Player: Arrows for move, Space for Jump, X for punch

Multiplayer: 

Player 1: W,A,S,D for move, X for Attack

Player 2: Arrows for Move, M for Attack

Thanks for playing our game and do not forget to leave comment about your experience :-)
